description: T(n,k) = S(n,k,k-2), 1<=k<=n-2, n >= 3, array S as in A050157.
comments: S(n,k,k) = C(n,k) for 1<=k<=n, n >= 1; cf. Pascal's triangle, A007318.S(n,k,k-1), 1<=k<=n-1, n >= 2 is given by A014430.
formula: T(n,k) = C(n,k) - n for k>1, and T(1, k) = n - 2. - _Andrei Asinowski_, Jan 27 2016
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Offset changed to 3 by _Michel Marcus_, Jan 29 2016
